title: T3 Fred Clarke PSA 2 high end 335.00
author: cobblove

posts.post_title: T3 Fred Clarke PSA 2 high end 335.00
posts.post_content:
Graded just a two but looks more like a 5-6 with corners and color, There is a ding o the right edge that cliped the paper so its stuck in a 2 case bc of that but looks much nicer in display.
Asking 335.00 gift SH for this gem. Let me know if you are interested
The marks on his pants are just on the case the image looks like an 8 with deep colors.
